title: President summons National Assembly session on July 27
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 21 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi has summoned the session of the National Assembly on July 27, the President House said Thursday.
The session of the National Assembly will be held at the Parliament House at 4 pm.
The president has called the meeting of the lower house of the parliament under Article 54(1) of the Constitution.
